subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The rookies Oscar Lindberg and Anthony Duclair scored in the first period, and J. T. Miller and Marek Hrivik added goals in the third as the Rangers beat the Blackhawks by 4-1 in a preseason game in Chicago.
snippet: The rookies Oscar Lindberg and Anthony Duclair scored in the first period, and J. T. Miller and Marek Hrivik added goals in the third as the Rangers beat the Blackhawks by 4-1 in a preseason game in Chicago.
